data.message:
Hey Em. Im an 18 year old girl. Who first never liked rapping at all. But when i heard you it was all YOU. Your voice is just Ad hey i gotta tell you that black hair suites you well. And blonde too. I wanna become rapper like you one day
And before i die i just want to see you. 

I justwanted tell you that. Be strong no what
Haters dont like when you do well in your life. 
I really love you. Im parentless and still in the middle of all the trouble i have i listen to your songs. It just takes my pain away. Please dont drink or smoke. healthy. I want to give you my number of living days to your life and extend your life. 

I dont wanna listen  to #when im gone  because dont even wanna imagine it. I love you Eminem
